mapper.select: SELECT no, userNo, serviceNo, content, reply, regdate, userNickName, userPhotoUrl FROM(SELECT no, userNo, serviceNo, content, reply, regdate, userNickName, userPhotoUrl, rownum r FROM(SELECT r.no,r.user_no userNo, r.service_no serviceNo, r.content, r.reply, r.regdate, u.nick_name userNickName, u.photo_url userPhotoUrl FROM reviews r, users u WHERE r.user_no = u.no AND r.service_no = #{serviceNo} ORDER BY r.regdate DESC)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT count(r.no) FROM reviews r, services c, users u WHERE r.service_no = c.no AND c.user_no = u.no AND c.role = 1 AND u.no = #{profileUserNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE reviews SET content = #{content}, reply = #{reply} WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews(no, user_no, service_no, content, regdate) VALUES(reviews_seq.nextval, #{userNo}, #{serviceNo}, #{content}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
